outline:
1. to flow, gush, issue, discharge
    1. (Qal)
      1. to flow, gush
      2. to die, pine away (fig.)
      3. to flow (of issue from woman), have an issue, flux
      4. flowing (participle)
kjv_def: flow, gush out, have a (running) issue, pine away, run.
strongs_def: to flow freely (as water), i.e. (specifically) to have a (sexual) flux; figuratively, to waste away; also to overflow
